  },

    "Name": "Regional Pairing",
    "FeatureWeight": 5,

    "GradeComments": "Site is not deployed on a Regional pairing",
    "SolutionComments": "To provide an extra level of redundancy/resiliency, deploy this application on the Regional pairing for Central US which is East US 2.\nConfirm that all the production applications requiring high availability are deployed in multiple regions. When choosing region pairing use the document under More information in this section"
  },

    "Name": "Platform upgrades resiliency",
